The claim is made by Senator Ron Johnson: 2018 interview on WTAQ's "John Muir Show" in Green Bay. This provides the source of the claim.
The claim states that there are: caravan size group of people apprehended trying to come into the country illegally, or coming to the ports of entry without documentation" every couple of days. This provides the specific statement being made.
The claim is supported by the U: S. Department of Homeland Security, which states that "over 270 individuals along the caravan route have criminal histories, including known gang membership." This provides additional evidence to support the claim.
The claim is further supported by statis: S. Customs and Border Protection, which show that in October 2018, 50,975 people were apprehended between ports of entry at the southwest border and 9,770 people presented themselves at ports of entry on the southwest border. This provides data that aligns with the claim.
